testcase.name: Perform a valid search on Lululemon
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the chrome browser.........................................passed When User opens the Website url "https://shop.lululemon.com"................passed And User enters search item "Bag" in the search bar.........................passed Then User should see search results for "Bag"...............................passed And User should close the browser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Perform a invalid search on Lululemon
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the chrome browser.........................................passed When User opens the Website url "https://shop.lululemon.com"................passed And User enters invalid search item "Bgg" in the search bar.................passed Then User should see search results as "No search results found"............passed And User should close the browser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Perform a search and select suggestion on Lululemon
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the chrome browser.........................................passed When User opens the Website url "https://shop.lululemon.com"................passed And User enters partial search item "Bag" in the search bar.................passed Then User should see search suggestions containing "Bag"....................passed And User selects the product "Fanny Bag" from the search suggestions........passed Then User should see search results for "Fanny Bag".........................passed And User should close the browser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Perform a search pagination on Lululemon
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the chrome browser.........................................passed When User opens the Website url "https://shop.lululemon.com"................passed And User enters search item "Bag" in the search bar.........................passed Then User should see search results for "Bag"...............................passed And User stores the initial results of the webpage as "InitialResults"......passed And User navigates to load the next page of search results..................passed Then User should see the next set of search results.........................passed And User should close the browser...........................................passed
